login.title: Login
login.subtitle: Decentralized Intellectual Property Collaboration Platform
login.feature2: ‚úÖ Write stories with friends, hosted by the Foundation shared copyright
login.feature3: ‚úÖ Earn points based on contributions, allocate copyright benefits proportionally
login.feature4: ‚úÖ Point records are completely transparent, fully traceable
login.feature5: ‚úÖ Build the largest collaborative IP creation community in the world

hint.tokenLocalOnly: It is strongly recommended to register a new user. Tokens are saved locally and will not be uploaded to the server.

login.registerHelpContent:
Step 1: Visit GitHub

Open your browser and go to https://github.com


Step 2: Click Sign Up

Click the Sign up button in the top right corner of GitHub homepage


Step 3: Fill Registration Info

‚Ä¢ Enter username
‚Ä¢ Enter email address
‚Ä¢ Set password
‚Ä¢ Verify you're not a robot


Step 4: Verify Email

Check your email and click the verification link sent by GitHub


Step 5: Get Token

Go directly to: https://github.com/settings/tokens


Generate Steps

‚Ä¢ Click Generate new token ‚Üí Generate new token (classic)
‚Ä¢ Fill Note: DIPCP Application
‚Ä¢ Select Expiration: Recommend 'Never' (no expiration)
‚Ä¢ Important: Check ALL permission options (select all)
‚Ä¢ Click Generate token


Copy Token

‚Ä¢ Copy and save the token immediately (only shown once)
‚Ä¢ Paste the token into the Token field on login page


Note: Token is only shown once, please save it carefully!

repoNotFound.message: Repository {owner}/{repo} does not exist or is not public. Please check if the repository URL is correct.

unauthorized.message: Authentication failed. Please check if your GitHub Access Token is correct.

Will delete in two steps: first local version, then cache version.

Note: Deleted directories cannot be recovered!

fileOperations.deleteBothSuccess: File "{fileName}" has been completely deleted from both local workspace and file cache.

error.rateLimitLow: Your GitHub API rate limit is 60 requests/hour, which is the base limit for new users. GitHub typically needs 1-2 days to increase your rate limit. Please wait 1-2 days before trying again, after which your rate limit will increase to 5000 requests/hour.
error.insufficientPermissions: Application submission failed: Insufficient permissions. Your Token may not have sufficient permissions to create Issues in the GitHub repository. Please check your Token permission settings.
error.authenticationFailed: Application submission failed: Authentication failed. Please check if your GitHub Token is valid.

logout.warningMessage: After exiting, all uncommitted local data will be permanently deleted, including:

logout.warningItem4: ‚Ä¢ User access token and cache data
logout.warningNote: Please ensure you have saved all important changes before exiting!

auth.title: GitHub Authentication
auth.message: Please enter your GitHub Personal Access Token for authentication:
auth.instructions:
How to get it:
1. Visit https://github.com/settings/tokens
2. Click "Generate new token (classic)"
3. Select "public_repo" permission
4. Copy the generated token

addTeam.triageDesc: Can manage Issues and PRs, but cannot push code

cla.title: Contributor License Agreement
cla.content: As a contributor to the DIPCP platform, you need to sign a Contributor License Agreement to transfer intellectual property ownership completely to the DIPCF Foundation. The foundation will uniformly manage and be responsible for the maintenance and operation of intellectual property. Please read through before signing the agreement.
cla.realNamePlaceholder: Your real name as a signature
cla.rejected: User refused to sign CLA agreement
cla.signingStatement: I, **{realName}** (GitHub username: {username}), confirm that I have read and agree to all terms of the above Contributor License Agreement.
cla.autoGenerated: This file is automatically generated by DIPCP system
